Seolah Bercanda, Jokowi Punya Maksud Khusus Soroti Rangkulan Paloh-Sohibul
07 Nov 2019, 19:13 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyoroti rangkulan tak biasa antara Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh dan Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman. Sorotan Jokowi itu dinilai mengandung maksud khusus.
Pakar Ekspresi Handoko Gani menganalisis ucapan Jokowi ketika menyoroti rangkulan Paloh dan Sohibul menggunakan (Layered Voice Analysis). Handoko merupakan satu-satunya trainer Interview dan Analisis Perilaku (Human Lie Detector) dari latar belakang Sipil yang memiliki otorisasi penggunaan alat LVA.
Berdasarkan analisa menggunakan alat LVA, Handoko menyebut bahwa semua ucapan Jokowi soal rangkulan Paloh dan Sohibul seluruhnya jujur. Meskipun, hal tersebut disampaikan seolah-seolah bercanda.
"Kalau dari sisi Kejujuran, apa yang dikatakan Pak Jokowi seluruhnya jujur. Nampak di hasil LVA tersebut, BAR di bawah adalah hijau dan kuning. Tidak ada merah ataupun orange yang merupakan indikasi kebohongan," kata Handoko kepada detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).


Foto: Analisis suara Jokowi (dok. Handoko Gani)

Selain itu, Handoko juga mengungkap unsur emosi dalam ucapan Jokowi soal rangkulan. Hal ini muncul dalam beberapa penekanan kalimat.

As if they were joking, Jokowi had a special intention to highlight Paloh-Sohibul's embrace
07 Nov 2019, 19:13 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) highlighted the unusual embrace between Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh and PKS President Sohibul Iman. Jokowi's highlight was considered to have a special purpose.
Expression Expert Handoko Gani analyzed Jokowi's words when highlighting the embrace of Paloh and Sohibul using (Layered Voice Analysis). Handoko is the only trainer for the Interview and Behavior Analysis (Human Lie Detector) from a Civil background who has authorization to use the LVA tool.
Based on an analysis using LVA tools, Handoko said that all of Jokowi's words about the Paloh and Sohibul embraces were all honest. Although, it was conveyed as if it were a joke.
"In terms of honesty, what Mr. Jokowi said is entirely honest. It appears in the LVA results, the BAR below is green and yellow. There is no red or orange which is an indication of lies," Handoko told AFP on Thursday (7/11 / / 2019).


Photo: Jokowi's voice analysis (doc. Handoko Gani)

In addition, Handoko also revealed the emotional element in Jokowi's words about embracing. This appears in several sentence emphases.
